items.sentence: Are you trying to get yourself thrown out of the club?
Even if it takes me the whole day, I'll do the typing.
If we unite our efforts, we'll be able to finish this.
Don't be afraid to raise your hand and ask a question.
It's not impossible to survive on just rice and beans.
It's been a while since I've told you that I love you.
Tom whispered something to Mary and she left the room.
Tom watched a movie while Mary was cleaning the house.
Tom wanted to apologize to Mary, but he was afraid to.
If someone had broken in, the alarm would've gone off.
Mary ran into one of her ex-boyfriends at Tom's party.
Did you really think I was the one slashed your tires?
Watch your step, or else you will trip on the baggage.
A sudden illness forced her to cancel her appointment.
They hate each other from the bottoms of their hearts.
Sometimes I say "yes," even though I want to say "no."
The crash was about three kilometers from the airport.
We're going to turn around and go back to the airport.
The only person who'd know that better than me is Tom.
If you can't say something nice, keep your mouth shut.
